how do check for WoL on my network card?: is it a add on network card?
well usually wol is something you enable on the mother board unless you bought your network card as an add on card
but these days most all motherboards come with Network cards so I would look in the bios
how do I know if it's an add on card? It's about 5 years old btw..
It's not one from these days xD
well open your pc and see if the network card is sticking out of a pci slot. I would think its a integrated card
if its attached to your motherboard then you know its integrated and I would start looking in your bios for a Wake on Lan Setting
